about_the_game:
Only Up!


Step into a challenge where your primary goal is to jump high and climb fast to escape the rising lava beneath your feet. Give no chances to either the lava or your competitors - always move up!

100-player Multiplayer!


Fight, push, knock down, and set cunning traps to be the last player on the path to the top. Every competitor is ready to play dirty for victory. Always stay one step ahead!

The Floor is Lava!


The lava relentlessly rises, making every pause a potential danger. You'll need to run faster, think strategically, and constantly move forward and up to survive.

Beware! Every step you take can be decisive. The unpredictability of the game and the competition with other players demands your full focus and lightning-fast reflexes. Don't let yourself be caught by opponents or the raging lava!

Various Game Modes


Try out different modes, from fast matches with disappearing platforms under your feet to classic runs reminiscent of squid games, where every second counts.

Parkour and Extreme


Master game mechanics, perform risky jumps through unexpected traps, and adapt to a constantly changing track. Excellent skill mastery and quick reflexes are required for a successful run.

Private Servers

Create your own server with friends and enjoy the game in a cozy group, independent of the rest of the world.

Constant Updates!

We're always on the move! The more you play, the faster we release new features. Expect regular updates, including cosmetic enhancements, new modes, and many other functions.
detailed_description:
NEWS

Our new game is coming soon! 🎮 Add it to your wishlist now! ✨ SILICONE HEART


About the Game

Only Up!


Step into a challenge where your primary goal is to jump high and climb fast to escape the rising lava beneath your feet. Give no chances to either the lava or your competitors - always move up!

100-player Multiplayer!


Fight, push, knock down, and set cunning traps to be the last player on the path to the top. Every competitor is ready to play dirty for victory. Always stay one step ahead!

The Floor is Lava!


The lava relentlessly rises, making every pause a potential danger. You'll need to run faster, think strategically, and constantly move forward and up to survive.

Beware! Every step you take can be decisive. The unpredictability of the game and the competition with other players demands your full focus and lightning-fast reflexes. Don't let yourself be caught by opponents or the raging lava!

Various Game Modes


Try out different modes, from fast matches with disappearing platforms under your feet to classic runs reminiscent of squid games, where every second counts.

Parkour and Extreme


Master game mechanics, perform risky jumps through unexpected traps, and adapt to a constantly changing track. Excellent skill mastery and quick reflexes are required for a successful run.

Private Servers

Create your own server with friends and enjoy the game in a cozy group, independent of the rest of the world.

Constant Updates!

We're always on the move! The more you play, the faster we release new features. Expect regular updates, including cosmetic enhancements, new modes, and many other functions.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo E7400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Up or Lava!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win 7
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel / AMD processor, 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Participate in only up races with 100 players. Fall down, and you'll burn in the lava! Play with friends or other players. The last survivor wins. Could it be you?
supported_languages: English, Russian, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, French
